metadata.source: Google Deep Research + Perplexity + Comprehensive bibliometric analysis

key_insights.medline_vs_pubmed: PubMed includes PMC (archive). MEDLINE is curated. Predatory journals CAN appear in PubMed via PMC!
key_insights.society_signal: 9/10 Tier B journals are society-owned. Verify Society URL → Journal URL link.
key_insights.volume_spike_threshold: >50% increase in one year = leading indicator of risk
key_insights.publisher_aliases: OMICS → Longdom → Hilaris → iMedPub (same entity, different names)

journals.notes: Gold standard medical journal

journals.notes: UK flagship medical journal

journals.notes: Seminal biomedical research. 'Star Methods' format is unique verification signal.

journals.notes: AGA flagship GI journal

journals.notes: APA flagship psychiatry journal

journals.name: Chest
journals.notes: ACCP official journal - leader in respiratory/critical care

journals.name: Radiology
journals.notes: RSNA flagship - top imaging journal

journals.name: Anesthesiology
journals.notes: ASA official journal

journals.name: Diabetes Care
journals.notes: ADA clinical focus journal - distinct from Diabetes (basic science)

journals.name: Journal of Clinical Investigation
journals.notes: Prestigious translational research journal

journals.name: Academic Emergency Medicine
journals.notes: SAEM official journal - emergency medicine

journals.name: BMJ Open
journals.notes: BMJ's open access general medical journal

journals.name: PLOS ONE
journals.notes: Pioneer mega-journal, accepts based on technical soundness

journals.name: Scientific Reports
journals.notes: Nature's mega-journal

journals.name: BMC Medicine
journals.notes: BMC's flagship medical journal, also MEDLINE indexed

journals.name: eLife
journals.notes: HHMI/Wellcome/Max Planck backed, innovative peer review

journals.name: Frontiers in Medicine
journals.notes: DOAJ listed but subject to academic debate about practices

journals.name: Journal of Medical Internet Research
journals.notes: Pioneer digital health journal

journals.name: International Journal of Environmental Research and Public Health
journals.notes: MDPI journal - DOAJ listed but practices debated

journals.name: Cureus
journals.notes: DOAJ and PMC indexed, crowdsourced peer review model

journals.name: Healthcare (Basel)
journals.notes: MDPI journal - DOAJ listed but practices debated

journals.name: PeerJ
journals.notes: Publishes full reviewer histories (Open Peer Review) - transparency signal predatory journals never show

journals.name: Cochrane Database of Systematic Reviews
journals.notes: Gold Standard for systematic reviews and evidence synthesis

journals.name: Environmental Health Perspectives
journals.notes: Diamond OA (NO APCs) - government funded, immune to financial incentives driving predatory publishing

journals.name: Journal of Proteomics & Bioinformatics
journals.notes: First OMICS journal (2008), used as evidence in FTC case. $50.1M judgment.

journals.name: Journal of Clinical Case Reports
journals.notes: Part of OMICS group, documented in FTC complaint

journals.name: Journal of Cell Science & Therapy
journals.notes: OMICS journal cited in FTC case

journals.name: International Journal of Advanced Research
journals.notes: Listed on both Beall's and Stop Predatory Journals

journals.name: International Journal of Science and Research
journals.notes: Mass-produced articles with minimal review

journals.name: Global Journal for Research Analysis
journals.notes: Global Journals Inc. on Beall's List as predatory publisher

journals.name: IOSR Journal of Business and Management
journals.notes: IOSR publisher on Beall's List

journals.name: International Journal of Innovative Research in Computer and Communication Engineering
journals.notes: On Beall's List

journals.name: International Journal of Engineering and Advanced Technology
journals.publisher: Blue Eyes Intelligence Engineering and Sciences
journals.notes: Publisher on Beall's List

journals.name: International Journal of Innovative Technology and Exploring Engineering
journals.publisher: Blue Eyes Intelligence Engineering and Sciences
journals.notes: Same predatory publisher as IJEAT

journals.name: International Journal of Engineering Trends and Technology
journals.notes: On Beall's List

journals.name: International Journal of Innovative Research in Science, Engineering and Technology
journals.notes: On multiple predatory lists

journals.name: International Journal of Innovative Research in Science, Engineering and Technology (different from above)
journals.notes: Example of predatory name duplication

journals.name: Journal of Scientific Achievements
journals.notes: SAS Publishers on Beall's List

journals.name: Medip Academy Journals
journals.notes: Medip Academy on multiple predatory lists

journals.name: International Journal of Advanced Computer Technology
predatory_indicators: Accepted 'Get Me Off Your F*cking Mailing List' paper
journals.sting_paper: Paper consisting of phrase repeated 863 times with flowcharts - ACCEPTED
journals.notes: FAMOUS STING CASE - accepted visibly fake paper proving zero editorial oversight

journals.name: International Journal of Molecular Biology: Open Access
journals.sting_paper: Paper on fictional 'Midichlorians' by 'Lucas McGeorge' citing 'Palpatine et al.' - ACCEPTED
journals.notes: Star Wars sting - accepted paper about fictional biological entities

journals.name: Austin Journal of Pharmacology and Therapeutics
journals.sting_paper: Same Midichlorians paper - ACCEPTED without review
journals.notes: Austin Publishing Group on Beall's List

journals.name: American Research Journal of Biosciences
journals.notes: Part of Star Wars sting operation

journals.name: American Journal of Medical and Biological Research
journals.sting_paper: Accepted Midichlorians paper but author refused to pay $360
journals.notes: SciEP on Beall's List - accepted fake paper conditional on payment

journals.name: Journal of Clinical & Experimental Cardiology
predatory_indicators: Listed academics on editorial board without consent
journals.notes: Part of OMICS empire - subject to FTC legal action

journals.name: Journal of Bioterrorism & Biodefense
journals.notes: OMICS journal - FTC sanctioned

journals.name: Journal of Clean Energy Technologies
journals.notes: Beall's standalone list - aggressive spam tactics

journals.name: Journal of Generalized Lie Theory and Applications
journals.notes: Case study: legitimate journal destroyed after predatory acquisition

journals.name: Global Journal of Advanced Research
journals.notes: Uses fake metric services to deceive authors

journals.name: IOSR Journal of Pharmacy
journals.notes: IOSR publisher on Beall's List

journals.name: World Journal of Pharmaceutical Research
journals.notes: Uses fake Scientific Journal Impact Factor

journals.name: European Journal of Biomedical and Pharmaceutical Sciences
journals.notes: Guaranteed acceptance model

journals.name: International Journal of Development Research
journals.notes: Beall's standalone journal list

journals.name: Oncotarget
journals.current_status: Still publishing, PMC but NOT MEDLINE
journals.notes: Was on Beall's List before deindexing. Classic case of journal decline.

journals.name: Stem Cell Research
journals.notes: In PMC but not MEDLINE indexed - legitimate but not highest tier

journals.name: Photoacoustics
journals.notes: Specialty journal in PMC but not MEDLINE

journals.name: One Health
journals.notes: Newer journal, PMC archived but not yet MEDLINE indexed

journals.name: The Lancet Planetary Health
journals.notes: Lancet family but new, not yet MEDLINE indexed

journals.name: Brain Hemorrhages
journals.notes: Specialty journal, PMC but not MEDLINE

journals.name: Journal of Experimental & Clinical Cancer Research
journals.notes: Lost Impact Factor in 2024 due to quality concerns

journals.name: Environmental Science and Pollution Research
journals.reason: Special issue guest editor problems, mass retractions
journals.notes: Lost IF June 2024. Classic case of volume spike + quality decline.

journals.name: Archives des Sciences (HIJACKED)
journals.original_publisher: Société de Physique et d'Histoire Naturelle de Genève
journals.hijacker_details: Fake website created mimicking legitimate Swiss journal
journals.notes: FIRST EVER documented hijacked journal

journals.name: Scandinavian Journal of Information Systems (HIJACKED)
journals.detection_method: Authors found papers published without consent
journals.notes: Recent case showing evolution of hijacking tactics

journals.name: Medical Principles and Practice (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.notes: Legitimate journal hijacked by fake website

journals.name: Scientia Pharmaceutica (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.hijacker_details: Fake website mimicking legitimate Austrian journal
journals.notes: Legitimate journal transferred to MDPI, old identity hijacked

journals.name: Anais da Academia Brasileira de Ciências (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.notes: Legitimate Brazilian journal identity stolen

journals.name: Sylwan (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.hijacker_details: Original is Polish forestry journal (print-only, no website). Hijacked site solicits engineering/medicine papers.
journals.detection_method: Scope mismatch - forestry journal accepting medical papers
journals.notes: Classic hijacking case - print-only journal with no web presence was easy target

journals.name: Jokull (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.hijacker_details: Original is Icelandic earth science journal. Fake .com site accepts multidisciplinary papers for fee.
journals.detection_method: Domain analysis - .com registered years after journal start date
journals.notes: Detection tip: Check domain registration date vs journal founding date

journals.name: Wulfenia (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.hijacker_details: Original is Austrian botany journal. Hijacker added 'Multidisciplinary' to title to justify accepting medical papers.
journals.detection_method: Name modification - 'Multidisciplinary' prefix added to botany journal
journals.notes: Hijacker tactic: Add 'Multidisciplinary' or 'International' to expand victim pool

journals.name: Transylvanian Review (HIJACKED VERSION)
journals.hijacker_details: Legitimate journal is ISI indexed for humanities. Fake site promises ISI indexing for any medical/science paper.
journals.detection_method: Scope mismatch - humanities journal accepting STEM papers
journals.notes: Hijacker exploits legitimate ISI indexing to deceive STEM authors

journals.name: Tumor Biology
journals.notes: Largest single mass retraction event 2017. Journal transferred to SAGE.

journals.name: Journal of Global Antimicrobial Resistance
journals.notes: Multiple paper mill retractions

journals.name: Analytical Biochemistry
journals.notes: Paper mill cluster retractions

journals.name: Journal of Nanomaterials
journals.notes: Part of massive Hindawi retraction wave. Wiley pausing submissions.

journals.name: Nano Today
journals.notes: High-IF journal affected by paper mills

journals.name: Deutsche Medizinische Wochenschrift
journals.notes: Oldest German-language medical journal. Verification harder due to language.

journals.name: Harefuah
journals.notes: Official journal of Israel Medical Association. Hebrew content, MEDLINE indexed.

journals.name: Chinese Medical Journal
journals.notes: Oldest medical journal in China. High volume of Chinese authors is demographic, not predatory.

journals.name: Indian Journal of Medical Research
journals.notes: Official journal of Indian Council of Medical Research. Medknow acquired by Wolters Kluwer adds corporate governance.

journals.name: Revista de Saúde Pública
journals.notes: Key Latin American public health data source. SciELO indexed.

journals.name: Eastern Mediterranean Health Journal
journals.publisher: WHO Regional Office for Eastern Mediterranean
journals.notes: WHO-published. Essential for EMRO regional health data.

journals.name: Cadernos de Saúde Pública
journals.notes: Leading South American public health journal. Multilingual.
